alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 10:34PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on exposed ridgetops. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Thursday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
